org.unallied.mmocraft

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.unallied.mmocraft.Location
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoundLocation

    public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A special type of Location that is not restricted along the x axis. Use this when you need special collisions for edge of world detection. This is still bounded along the y axis.
    Author:
    Faythless
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setX

        public void setX(long x)
        This should only be used in special cases. For all movement, use the move functions instead. This function assigns a new x value.
        Parameters:
        x - the new x value (each value of x is one block)

      • setY

        public void setY(long y)
        This should only be used in special cases. For all movement, use the move functions instead. This function assigns a new y value.
        Parameters:
        y - the new y value (each value of y is one block)

      • setXOffset

        public void setXOffset(float xOffset)
        This should only be used in special cases. For all movement, use the move functions instead. This function assigns a new x offset.
        Parameters:
        xOffset - the new x offset (each value is 1 pixel)

      • setYOffset

        public void setYOffset(float yOffset)
        This should only be used in special cases. For all movement, use the move functions instead. This function assigns a new y offset.
        Parameters:
        yOffset - the new y offset (each value is 1 pixel)
